staticherobanner.description: New miles earning structure effective January 1, 2015*
staticherobanner.title: Earn miles just for paying your gas bill!

delta_signup_content.confirmationpagesubhead: You are now enrolled in Grand Rapids Energy' Delta SkyMiles partnership program, where you can earn miles just for paying your gas bill!
delta_signup_content.header:
It’s easy to start participating.

Simply enter your GRE account and SkyMiles member information below. If you’d prefer to enroll by phone, call GRE toll-free at 1.800.841.1541 and mention that you would like to enroll in GRE’s Delta SkyMiles partnership program. Please have your SkyMiles account number handy when you call.
delta_signup_content.sidecontent:
Switch to Grand Rapids Energy and start earning with Delta SkyMiles®.

Grand Rapids Energy is excited to be a Delta SkyMiles partner and the only alternative gas supplier in Michigan with whom you can earn miles from Delta just for paying your natural gas bill.

HOW IT WORKS:

  • Customers will now earn TWO miles for every dollar spent on their GRE supplier natural gas charges (excluding sales tax and one-time charges)!Ɨ
  • And, if you are a Delta SkyMiles® Medallion® member, Delta will award an additional mile for each dollar spent as described above!

Frequently Asked Questions >

Delta Program Terms & Conditions >
delta_signup_content.viewplansheader: Not a Grand Rapids Energy customer?
delta_signup_content.viewplanssubhead: Not yet a customer, but want to sign up with Grand Rapids Energy to take advantage of this offer?
